message: The next day, I'm sitting behind the counter at Hum-Drum Junk like usual.
Damn headaches...
I rub the bridge of my nose. My head's been pounding ever since I woke up.

I even took my medicine after breakfast...
Maybe I'm getting sick.

name: 羽賀
message: "Aoba! Think you could make a delivery?"
I hear Mr. Haga clattering around in the back of the store.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Oh, let me help... Ngh."
I try to stand up, but my legs wobble. I quickly grab the counter.

name: 羽賀
message: "You alright?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Sorry, just a little dizzy."

name: 羽賀
message:
"Please sit down. I can do it myself.
...Hnnngh! Hah! Hiiya!"

name: 羽賀
message: "Phew."

name: 羽賀
message: "Hm? What's the matter?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Oh. I was just kind of impressed."

name: 羽賀
message: "Don't be silly. Hahaha."

name: 凡人くん
message: "Cleaning. Cleaning."
Mr. Haga's Allmate, Junker, dances around him in circles.

name: 羽賀
message: "Oh, Junker, please clean the back."

name: 凡人くん
message: "Back. Back."
Junker returns to the back of the shop.

name: 羽賀
message: "Oh, right. Could you make a delivery for me?"
Mr. Haga pulls a small paper bag out of his pocket.

name: 羽賀
message: "The order didn't come in until the middle of the night, but the customer requested express delivery."
I look at the slip on the package. It's going to an address here in the east quarter. It definitely would be faster to deliver it directly from the shop.

name: 羽賀
message: "One of our suppliers will be here soon, so I can't step away right now. I'm sorry."

name: 蒼葉
message: "It's fine. I'll leave right now."

name: 羽賀
message: "Thank you."
Mr. Haga smiles, then goes down to the basement.
My head still feels like a brick, but I have work to do. I have to tough it out.
I smack myself lightly to clear away the funk, then pick up my bag and the package and head outside.
